name: semantic-coloring-search-editor
description: A VS Code extension for file search with colorized results. Use it as an alternative to VS Code's built-in Search Editor.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run build-binary
scripts.build-binary: cd file_walker && mkdir -p ../bin && PATH="$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/stable-aarch64-apple-darwin/bin:$PATH" cargo build --release --target aarch64-apple-darwin --bin file_walker && PATH="$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/stable-aarch64-apple-darwin/bin:$PATH" cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin --bin file_walker && PATH="$HOME/.rustup/toolchains/stable-aarch64-apple-darwin/bin:$PATH" cargo build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu --bin file_walker && cp target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/file_walker ../bin/file_walker-darwin-arm64 && cp target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/file_walker ../bin/file_walker-darwin-x64 && cp target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/file_walker.exe ../bin/file_walker-win32-x64.exe
